| `autoResizeType`           | `auto-resize-type`            | If autoResize, in here select the type, Width, height, or both                        | `"Both" \| "Horizontal" \| "Vertical"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `undefined` |

| `theme`                    | `theme`                       | Theme for showing the graph                                                           | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `undefined` |
| `trendPeriod`              | `trend-period`                | If includeTrend, defines the period of the trend                                      | `"LastDay" \| "LastHour" \| "LastMinute" \| "LastMonth" \| "LastQuarter" \| "LastSecond" \| "LastSemester" \| "LastWeek" \| "LastYear" \| "SinceTheBeginning"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `type`                     | `type`                        | Type of the QueryViewer: Table, PivotTable, Chart, Card                               | `"Card" \| "Chart" \| "Default" \| "PivotTable" \| "Table"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `undefined` |
